summary: This document is an email chain between FBI attorneys discussing a complaint filed on February 14, 2024, alleging FBI negligence in relation to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails involve forwarding administrative claims and coordinating on the legal matter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The complaint alleges negligence by the FBI in relation to him.

events.title: Complaint Filed Against FBI
events.description: A complaint was filed alleging negligence by the FBI in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Administrative Claims Received
events.description: Two administrative claims related to Epstein were received.

locations: 935 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Room 10140 Washington, DC 20535 (FBI Office of the General Counsel)
keyFacts: A complaint was filed on February 14, 2024, alleging FBI negligence in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.
The FBI had not been formally served with the complaint as of February 16, 2024.
The FBI received two administrative claims related to Epstein on February 15, 2024.
The email correspondence is between attorneys in the FBI's Office of the General Counsel.
The case is referenced as 'Does 1-12 v. US (SDNY) (Epstein)'.
